channel.title: My 508 Client! :(
channel.description:
ok everyone
ive got the cache, ive installed it, ive downloaded a 508 client and extracted it to my desktop.
im using the ip Rune-sleepz.no-ip.biz
its online ^
but when ever i run my client it stops at connecting to update server.
someone please help me :(

item.title: My 508 Client! :(
item.dc:creator: @Mop_U_Up Mop U Up
item.description:
@Mop_U_Up wrote:

im logging onto that server and the ip is correctly typed.

it says this in the cmd box.

error_game_js5connect

any idea’s?

Read full topic

item.title: My 508 Client! :(
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If your computer is the host you need to connect to 127.0.0.1
Only other people logging into your server need to type your IP

note: Remove your IP, you might get into trouble or ddos’d.

Read full topic

item.title: My 508 Client! :(
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Make sure the port is correct, and make sure the IP is typed absolutely correct.

Read full topic
